entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this morning then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
